channel.title: Buckethead
channel.description:
[img]http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/bd/Buckethead.jpg/220px-Buckethead.jpg[/img] I just got his album The Cuckoo Clocks Of Hell. And he is one hell of a guitarist. He's really good although he doesn't sing (At least not on that album). You should check him out
http://albumbase.com.
Buckethead (born Brian Carroll in 1969), is an American guitarist and composer. With his signature white plastic mask and KFC bucket, Carroll created a persona in order to emphasize his music over his personal identity. He is a prolific composer, having released 21 solo albums and performed on 33 more. His music spans a wide variety of genres including thrash metal, funk, and electronica.
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Buckethead

Buckethead (born Brian Carroll in 1969), is an American guitarist and composer. With his signature white plastic mask and KFC bucket, Carroll created a persona in order to emphasize his music over his personal identity. He is a prolific composer, having released 21 solo albums and performed on 33 more. His music spans a wide variety of genres including thrash metal, funk, and electronica.

en.wikipedia.org

Buckethead

Brian Patrick Carroll (born May 13, 1969), known professionally as Buckethead, is an American multi-instrumentalist musician who has received critical acclaim for his innovative electric guitar playing. His music spans many genres, including progressive metal, funk, blues, bluegrass, ambient, and avant-garde music. He performs primarily as a solo artist, though he has collaborated extensively with a wide variety of high-profile artists such as Bill Laswell, Bootsy Collins, Bernie Worrell, Igg...
